title: Adaptatron-3000
text: Card shop (turrets)

title: Crimson Aristocrat
text: Buy [Round End: deal 1 to me and grant me +2|+0] for a unit (-1 HP), (repeatable, cost doubles)

title: Arena Kingpin
text: Buy power for 500 gold: Round Start: Grant a random item to a card in hand or Sell a follower for 200 gold

title: The Rekindler
text: Buy a revive token for 100 gold

title: Slotbot
text: Buy a re-roll token for 30 gold(repeatable, cost doubles)

title: Slaughter Docks
text: Card shop with normal/epic items

title: Mechanized Mimic
text: Card shop with epic items

title: Monastery of Hirana
text: Heal 25% or Cut a card or Add [Quick Attack] to a unit

title: Solitary Monk
text: Cut all copies of a card

title: Laurent Bladekeeper
text: Card shop (weapon-themed spells) with a random rare item

title: Honored Lord
text: Choose a rare item for your champion

title: Practical Perfectionist
text: Create 3 copies of a card or Add two copies of [Counterfeit Copies] with a random item

title: Used Cask Salesman
text: Sell all copies of a card from your deck(rarity and upgrades affect cost)

title: Incisive Tactician
text: Upgrade a power to a power of higher rarity or Add a Ever Onward

title: Citrus Courier
text: Heal for 50% max HP or Select a card with a healing item

title: Mind Meld
text: Choose a card and cut all copies for health

title: Salvage
text: Card shop for health

title: Smooth Soloist
text: Buy a power(common - 200, rare - 300, epic - 400 or legendary - 500)

title: Silent Shadowseer
text: Pay health to add[+3|+3, ephemeral](repeatable, cost increases)

title: Ethereal Remitter
text: Add a double-edged power

title: Arena Mechacaster
text: Card shop (mecha-yordles)

title: Grave Physician
text: Add a Risen/Reborn with a random item or [Salt And Stitches] with a random rare item

title: Young Witch
text: Shop for spells with items

title: The Grand Plaza
text: Add challenger to a unit or 4[Dauntless Vanguard] with item or one of [Remembrance]/[For The Fallen]/[Dawnspeakers] with item

title: Chamber of Renewal
text: Add spellshield to a champion or Add [Chamber of Renewal] with item

title: Fae Guide
text: Add elusive to a card

title: Boxtopus
text: Buy a [Dust Up Diplomacy] with item for health

title: Thrashing Snapper
text: Add a [Thrashing Snapper]/[Scalled Snapper] with a random rare item

title: Scribe of Sorrows
text: Buy one of the following powers (starting at 75 gold) (repeatable, cost doubles)

title: Fallen Feline
text: Add 2 copies of a token card

title: Mageseeker Investigator
text: Add power Mageseeker's Clearance(Your spells are Fleeting. When you play a spell that isn't Final Spark, create a Final Spark in hand) or Add [Detain] with a random item

title: Reaver's Row
text: Buy 1 cost cards with items

title: Blossoming Blade
text: Add Play: I start a free attack to a unit

title: Avatar of the Tides
text: Add a epic power or Add an epic item to a champion or Get 300 gold

title: Bayou Brunch
text: Add an item to Tahm Kench or a unit

title: Claws of the Dragon
text: Add an epic item to a spell

title: Defective Swapbot
text: Buy 3 re-roll tokens for 80 gold

title: Dreg Dredgers
text: Buy cards with negative items

title: Island Navigator
text: Add scout item to a unit

title: The Loose Cannon
text: Add to Jinx: When I'm summoned, create a [The Loose Cannon] in hand

title: The Piltover Enforcer
text: Add to Vi: When I'm summoned, create a [The Piltover Enforcer] in hand

title: Poros!
text: Buy a poro with item or Buy power: Round Start: Summon a random 1-cost poro for 400 gold

title: Slight of Hand
text: Buy When I'm summoned, draw 1 for a unit for 10 gold

title: The Syren
text: Add a The Syren with item: -2 mana or elusive or capture

title: Tasty Faefolk
text: Get +5 current and max HP or Add 2 [Tasty Faefolk] with item

title: Yone, Windchaser
text: Card shop with random item

title: War Chefs
text: Heal 50% or Add a [Healing Balm] with item

title: Stilted Robemaker
text: Buy 1 [Darkness] card or other cards related to [Darkness] card, (repeatable, cost doubles)

title: Jack, the Winner
text: Buy power for 7 hp

title: Zaunite Urchin
text: Buy power: Game Start: draw 2 for 100 gold or Buy a Zaunite Urchin with item for 60 gold

title: Chump Whump
text: Add 2 copies of [Poison Puffcap] with item
